thread.title: Evra's superb birthday message for Ji-Sung Park
thread.title_full: Evra's superb birthday message for Ji-Sung Park

title: Evra's superb birthday message for Ji-Sung Park
text:
0 25-Feb-2017 18:21:18 The full-back has a message for his old Manchester United buddy, who turned 36 on Saturday 
We can't be the only ones whose eyes light up every time Patrice Evra posts something new to Instagram. 
The Frenchman has become something of a legend on social media, posting images and videos of himself singing, dancing, dressing up, pranking and everything inbetween. 
In his latest offering, Evra has knocked up a parody poster for Rush Hour 3 to wish Ji-Sung Park a happy birthday, with Park taking the place of Jackie Chan and Evra taking over Chris Tucker's spot. A post shared by Patrice Evra (@patrice.evra) on Feb 25, 2017 at 2:44am PST 
Now that's a film we'd like to see. 
#welovethisgame
